price: Kandi ntugakeke na rimwe ko Allah azica isezerano yasezeranyije Intumwa ze. Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Umunyacyubahiro bihebuje, Nyirukwihimura bikaze.
arabic: فَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِفَ وَعۡدِهِۦ رُسُلَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٞ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: falā taḥsabanna al-laha mukh'lifa waʿdihi rusulahu inna al-laha ʿazīzun dhū intiqāmin
